subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Ireland beat Wales, 17-15, before a raucous full house in Cardiff. Since 2000, no team had won more games in the Six Nations tournament than Ireland, but until Saturday it had not turned those victories into a title.
snippet: Ireland beat Wales, 17-15, before a raucous full house in Cardiff. Since 2000, no team had won more games in the Six Nations tournament than Ireland, but until Saturday it had not turned those victories into a title.
